input.sentences: a neighborhood got closed down for our run today .
volunteers were standing at every mile to make sure the runners were okay .
a group of four people stuck together for the entire run .
a couple more streets were closed down to accommodate the race .
one volunteer stood at the finish line and waited for the day to be over .
output.sentences: Jan and David went to the fair.
Jan and David met everyone there.
When it was over they all had a talk.
